name: FEmitterDynamicParameter
doc: Helper structure for displaying the parameter.

ValueMethod: Where to get the parameter value from.
ParamValue: The distriubtion for the parameter value.
bUseEmitterTime: If true, use the EmitterTime to retrieve the value, otherwise use Particle RelativeTime.
bSpawnTimeOnly: If true, only set the value at spawn time of the particle, otherwise update each frame.
bScaleVelocityByParamValue: If true, scale the velocity value selected in ValueMethod by the evaluated ParamValue.
